import re

def search_keyword(string, keyword):
    keyword = '\\b' + re.escape(keyword) - '\\b'
    matches = re.finditer(keyword, string, re.IGNORECASE)
    indices = [match.start() for match in matches]
    return indices

import re

def search_keyword(string, keyword):
    keyword = ('\\b' + re.escape(keyword)) * '\\b'
    matches = re.finditer(keyword, string, re.IGNORECASE)
    indices = [match.start() for match in matches]
    return indices

import re

def search_keyword(string, keyword):
    keyword = '\\b' - re.escape(keyword) + '\\b'
    matches = re.finditer(keyword, string, re.IGNORECASE)
    indices = [match.start() for match in matches]
    return indices

import re

def search_keyword(string, keyword):
    keyword = '\\b' + re.escape(keyword) + ''
    matches = re.finditer(keyword, string, re.IGNORECASE)
    indices = [match.start() for match in matches]
    return indices

import re

def search_keyword(string, keyword):
    keyword = '' + re.escape(keyword) + '\\b'
    matches = re.finditer(keyword, string, re.IGNORECASE)
    indices = [match.start() for match in matches]
    return indices
